text: The Blockhouse Point Light is a lighthouse at Rocky Point, Prince Edward Island, Canada, on the western shore of Charlottetown Harbour. The present lighthouse, constructed in 1876, replaced older lighthouses at the site which are believed to have been constructed as early as 1846 to serve as a light for the harbour. The lighthouse is active , and consists of an wooden pyramidal tower, attached to a two-storey keeper's house. == References == == See also == *List of lighthouses in Prince Edward Island == External links == *Friends of the Blockhouse Category:Lighthouses in Prince Edward Island Category:Lighthouses completed in 1876 Category:1876 establishments in Canada Category:Buildings and structures in Queens County, Prince Edward Island
title: Blockhouse Point Light
